changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingUsername}') CREATE USER ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingUsername} WITH PASSWORD = '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingPassword}', DEFAULT_SCHEMA = ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}

rollback.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingUsername}') DROP USER ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingUsername}
